row.process:
! &GLOBAL_HOSTNAME# :DEFINE &T_MYHOST#, string, 100 :DEFINE &T_MYIP#, string, 100 :FILL &T_MYIP#[] = STR_SPLIT(&LISTE_IP#," ") :FILL &T_MYHOST#[] = STR_SPLIT(&LISTE_HOSTNAME#," ") :SET &RUNVAR# = 1 :SET &MY_RC#="OK" :WHILE &RUNVAR# LE &NUMBER_CLIENT# : PRINT "Line &RUNVAR#: &T_MYHOST#[&RUNVAR#]" : IF &T_MYHOST#[&RUNVAR#] = &GLOBAL_HOSTNAME# : PSET &GLOBAL_IP# = &T_MYIP#[&RUNVAR#] : ENDIF :SET &RUNVAR# = &RUNVAR# + 1 :ENDWHILE
:SET &MY_USER#=GET_VAR(VARA.TECHNICAL.QIP,"USER") :SET &MY_PASSWORD#=GET_VAR(VARA.TECHNICAL.QIP,"PASSWORD") :SET &MY_QIPSERVER#=GET_VAR(VARA.TECHNICAL.QIP,"QIPSERVER")
echo ssh command reserver QIP &GLOBAL_IP# pour &GLOBAL_HOSTNAME# if { $? -ne 0 ] ; then echo ko :REGISTER_VARIABLE "MY_RC#","KO" fi

row.post_process: :IF &MY_RC# = "KO" : PRINT KO: QIP GET IP QIP &GLOBAL_IP# pour &GLOBAL_HOSTNAME# : PRINT DEBUG &EXIT_KISS_KO# : PSET &EXIT_KISS_KO#="&EXIT_KISS_KO#,QIP &GLOBAL_IP# pour &GLOBAL_HOSTNAME#" : MODIFY_STATE STATUS_TEXT="QIP KO" : MODIFY_STATE RETCODE=10 :ELSE : PRINT OK: QIP &GLOBAL_IP# pour &GLOBAL_HOSTNAME# : PSET &EXIT_KISS_OK#="&EXIT_KISS_OK#,QIP &GLOBAL_IP# pour &GLOBAL_HOSTNAME#" :ENDIF
